txt.en: 'These towers often need to be repaired. It is my task today.'
'Many in the Falcon clan are natural climbers.'
'At festival, races are held to see who can fastest scale the towers.'
'Our look-outs saw your company approaching from far away.'
'It is important that these towers remain standing and in good condition.'
'A Ranger was helping me, but Idele sent him to the orchard instead.'
